# Charlie Hulcher

> Engineering Leader and AI Researcher focused on building tech startup teams and exploring advanced AI applications.

## About

## Sections
- [Posts](https://charlie.engineer/posts/): All posts
- [Essays](https://charlie.engineer/essays/): Long-form writing
- [Notes](https://charlie.engineer/notes/): Short build logs and observations
- [Links](https://charlie.engineer/links/): Curated external links with commentary

## Writing
- [agentctl: Headless Orchestration for Coding Agents](https://charlie.engineer/posts/agentctl/): A CLI that wraps coding agents for headless orchestration and multi-adapter supervision across Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini.
- [OrgLoop: Organization as Code for Autonomous AI Organizations](https://charlie.engineer/posts/orgloop-organization-as-code/): OrgLoop is an open-source runtime that wires AI agents together with declarative event routing.
- [Coding is Creative](https://charlie.engineer/posts/coding-is-creative/): Programming as a creative outlet can be understood by comparing it to traditional artistic pursuit.
- [Grand Prize at LA Hacks - Virtual Reality Treadmill](https://charlie.engineer/posts/la-hacks-tred/): From 2014 - winning the largest hackathon in history.
- [Autonomous Hovercraft](https://charlie.engineer/posts/autonomous-hovercraft/): From 2012 - Clark School of Engineering winning autonomous hovercraft.
